features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新主要针对系统进行了优化，推荐您进行更新
• YOYO 玩图新增新年相关生图模板，一键为您生成新春写真。体验路径：唤醒 YOYO > 输入“YOYO 玩图” > AI 玩图 > AI 生图 > 更多 > 选择对应模板 > 做同款 (YOYO 智能体需要通过应用市场升级到 90.10.26.040 及以上)
• YOYO 玩图新增 AI 换装，一键为您换新装。体验路径：唤醒 YOYO > 输入“YOYO 玩图” > AI 玩图 > AI 换装 > 选择对应模板 > 选择人像照片 (YOYO 智能体需要通过应用市场升级到 90.10.26.040 及以上)
• 优化部分场景使用卡顿问题，提升整机流畅性
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持
Dear user, this update mainly enhances the system performance. Update to enjoy the improvements

• YOYO Images features new AI generation templates for Spring Festival, enabling you to produce your Spring Festival photos with a single tap. Activate YOYO, enter "YOYO Images", then go to AI images > AI generation > More > Select your desired template > Get this style (Update the YOYO Agent to version 90.10.26.040 or above via the App Market)

• YOYO Images introduces AI wardrobe, letting you get a new look with just one tap. Activate YOYO, enter "YOYO Images", then go to AI images > AI wardrobe > Select your desired template > Select a portrait photo (Update the YOYO Agent to version 90.10.26.040 or above via the App Market)
• Resolves the occasional stuttering issues to enhance the overall smoothness of the device

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating 2. Discover more information on product features in Tips 3. If you encounter any issue during use, please get support by going to My Honor or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us
